# EpiGraphDB API endpoints

This document is auto generated from
[EpiGraphDB API specification](http://api.epigraphdb.org).

```{r r_init, include=FALSE}
library("reticulate")
use_condaenv("epigraphdb_api", required = TRUE)
```

```{python py_init, include=FALSE}
import sys

sys.path.append('../../')
```

```{python py_setup}
from environs import Env
env = Env()
env.read_env()

EPIGRAPHDB_API_URL = env.str("EPIGRAPHDB_API_URL", "https://api.epigraphdb.org")
print(EPIGRAPHDB_API_URL)
```

## Topic endpoints

```{python topic_endpoints, results='asis', echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

rmd_render_endpoints(api_url=EPIGRAPHDB_API_URL, endpoint_params=topic_params)
```
